Public MustInherit Class TaxonomyItemCollection(Of T) Inherits IndexedCollection(Of T)
generic <typename T> where T : TaxonomyItempublic ref class TaxonomyItemCollection abstract : Microsoft::SharePoint::Taxonomy::Generic::IndexedCollection<T>
type TaxonomyItemCollection<'T (requires 'T :> TaxonomyItem)> = class inherit IndexedCollection<'T (requires 'T :> TaxonomyItem)>

Docs.summary: Represents a generic abstract base class collection with support for containing taxonomy items such as the object and the object.

remarks.para: This class provides standard support for the object and object and an integer indexer through the GenericCollection base class. Additionally, it provides string and GUID indexers with behavior defined by the derived collection class.
